title: Ultimate Anime Combat Sounds Pack
description: 265 AAA-quality & game-ready sound effects for Anime Combat Sounds, Huge Punches, Stingers & more!
longDescription:
This pack contains 265 sound effects for Anime Combat Sounds, Huge Punches, Stingers, Footsteps & more!


Includes:

► Punches (With Whooshes, Impacts, Super Punch Impacts, etc...)

► Sword Slices (Super, Normal, Sword Impacts, etc...)

► Movement (Jumping, Footsteps, Body Falls, Abstract articulations, etc...)

► Stingers (Retro Anime Stingers, Special Tonal Impacts, etc...)

► Punch Combos, Slaps & much more!


🎥 Watch a video preview here

🔊 Listen to the FULL audio preview here

📜 SFX List / Documentation


More info:

► Perfect for any game or project that requires a huge punch & interesting anime flair.

► Each sound is designed by professionals using unique source material, giving you huge variation for your game's combat.

► Mixed and mastered to a game-ready standard, check out the previews for yourself - we are immensely proud of these sounds.


Designed By

The team at Daydream Sound (support@daydreamsound.com)


Tags: sfx, sound effects, anime sound effects, anime sound effect, anime combat sounds, anime combat sound design, anime punch sounds, anime sword sounds, anime game sounds, anime sfx, anime combat sfx, anime stingers, retro anime sounds, anime punch combos, anime impacts, anime whooshes
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 265

Number of Audio Cues: 265

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit,44.1kHz

Supported Development Platforms: ALL


Documentation: SFX List / Documentation
